detail_desc: Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton containing glittery threads with frills at the shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in cotton twill with an inner sweatband and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Lace bralette with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short, pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with a faux fur-trimmed hood, stand up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, concealed side pockets and covered elastication and a tab with an adjustable fastening at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a small back vent. Lined.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and short puff sleeve. Press-studs at the back of the neck and at the crotch.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Double metal bangle. Width 0.8 cm.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and straight legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with striped ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a zipped back pocket.
Long skirt in airy chiffon with a high, elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short jersey underskirt.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy with straps that fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 0-12M, and elasticated hems. Lined at the top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved shirt with a bow tie or tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Tie/bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Treggings in stretch corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-10Y), fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shoulder bag with a flap and decorative metal buckle and a shoulder strap with metal chains at the ends. Lined.
Coat in soft twill with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with moss-knit stripes, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leather slides with a decorative knot detail at the top, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sandals in imitation leather with narrow straps over the foot and long straps that tie around the ankle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.

Non-wired bandeau bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, lined, gently padded cups with removable inserts, narrow detachable shoulder straps and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with long sleeves. Overlocked edges at the neck, cuffs and hem.
Wide jersey top in a burnout-patterned cotton blend with a deep neckline at the front, short raglan sleeves, visible seams and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt jacket in cotton twill. Relaxed fit with a collar, two-way zip down the front, yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a concealed fastener. Unlined.
Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a mask. Costume with print motifs and a zip and fastener at the front. Mask with holes for the eyes.
Trousers in a soft weave made from a linen blend with a sheen. Belt loops at the waist, side pockets and welt back pockets. Close fitting at the top with a high waist and straight, extra-long legs.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and smocked hems.
Long-sleeved cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Short shorts in a textured-weave viscose blend with an elasticated waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pleats at the front and side pockets.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.

Boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with pointed toes and block heels. Spacious, knee-high shaft that is rounded at the top and has loops at the sides. Satin linings and insoles. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with wide smocking front and back, a frill trim top and bottom and tie-top shoulder straps.
Long jacket in jacquard-patterned jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft, featherlight bra in mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side and back pockets.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathered tiers to create width in the skirt. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Sports bag in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh section, drawstring and handle at the top. Shoulder straps and a zipped patch pocket. Lined.

Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined hood and long raglan sleeves. Zip at the top that continues around the edges of the hood, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a contrasting colour, lined hood, buttons down the front and at the cuffs and flap chest pockets with a button.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Sandals with narrow straps. Adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle.

Small purse in grained imitation patent leather with a tab and press-stud fastening. Six card compartments, one with a transparent plastic window, a note compartment at one side and a zipped outer compartment. Length approx. 10.5 cm. Height approx. 9 cm. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Vest top in slub cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and raw edges.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and wide ties at the sides.
Short skirt in stretch velvet with a decorative pattern on the front. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Pyjamas in soft pile. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Dress with a bodice in sturdy jersey and skirt in a sturdy weave. Short cap sleeves, a visible zip at the back, a gathered seam and large, a decorative bow at the waist, and a flared, printed skirt. Lined at the bottom.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and chin guard at the front. Chest pocket with a flap and press-stud, front pockets with a waterproof zip, an adjustable elasticated waist and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reinforced legs and back, reinforced elastic strap under the feet and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Fitted blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline and a small opening with ties at the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking at the back.
Cap with a print motif and appliqué. Sweatband in a cotton weave and covered elastication at the back.
Striped scarf in an airy weave with short fringe trims along the sides. Size 100x200 cm.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Tube scarf in a soft textured knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 151 cm.
Maxi skirt woven in a cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist and gathered tiers to create width and volume. Unlined.
Boots in waterproof imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with covered heels and a soft shaft with a zip on the inside. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Short jersey skirt with an elasticated waist.
Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Wide trousers in an airy weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt at the front. Straight legs with thigh-high slits. Unlined.
